nodes.bodyText: Was it a bug that it had readInt() instead of readUnsignedInt() here? Or did you somehow accidentally change this? Other than this, this PR looks good, but I haven't tested it yet.

I understand that, but why did you change this line?
Edit: hmm… a size can't be negative, right?

in somewhere was an overflow (the file was to big), so i discarded every possible overflow. Also, in mp4 box sizes are unsigned values, but since in DASH streams, bigger boxes llike mdat never reachs 2GB
yes, size cannot be negative
